findings: Left kidney shows coarse, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 9.17 bpm.

Thyroid gland shows hypoechoic echotexture; no suspicious nodules.

Liver appears mildly heterogeneous with no focal lesions.
